text: At that same hour Jesus rejoiced in the 10:21 Spirit 92.4% ¦ Holy Spirit NA {0.2%} SBL TH WH {0.1%}Spirit and said, “I praise yoʋ, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, because yoʋ have hidden these things from the wise and intelligent, and revealed them to infants.
